short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new way to protect web users and websites from bots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bositron is a web extension that allows websites an extra level of protection against bots or other malicious activities that users may do. Without someone both having an extension and being logged in, the protected page will redirect any attempt to connect to it. To make an account, download the extension and head to https://www.bositron.com/register.html.
